message: Destiny Shantal Cruz

How much power do we have over Mother Nature anyway now?? I know we can do the best by our environment, but that is all we can do. God is in control. We need to trust God and obey his commandments. He is not pleased with some because they follow the old devil and destroy their own spirits. We are his children!!! Does he not have the right to discipline us?? God wants desperately to save all of his children, but if they do not listen, he has to teach them in the way he sees fit. He cares about our eternal welfare!! He also cannot let them lead others of his children down the path to destruction. Missionary work is done on the other side, and some will not listen here....and some not even there. Some blow it totally on this earth already too. There are varying degrees of glory, and we earn what we have lived for, or a place not a degree of glory. """"Choose ye this day whom ye will serve, but for as for me and my house, we will serve the Lord.""""
Abso-fuckin-lutely.
Cut of all the gov. services. Ge up and go to work doing something.3
""""Laying"""". Are you guys for real? What are the boxes laying? Eggs??? Did anyone actually pay attention in English class? And you guys are the media??? Give me a break!!
Everyone just says one pair... One more pair then y'all would give the man. God bless the officer.
Welcome to today's society where love doesn't live.

It doesn't work, but it's right...... yeah, right. Look at any Socialist country. When we go to school we get grades. Give everyone in the class a C and see what happens. Give people law and order, and reward hard work. Temper with Charity.
Hasn't Obama deported the most immigrants than any American president? What is so wrong with curtailing and dare I say it """"preventing"""" illegal immigration?
Not true.
He should also be charge with assault.
Yes, they should do it. Do it right now. In fact, why haven't you left yet? Make sure you turn the lights out.
How about renaming the New England Cheaters. Losers. Have they played a fair game yet? The world will never know, but I bet Tom and Bill do!!!!
What does that have to do with President Obama? I don't mind the message she's sharing, I 100% oppose the lie that """"Obama tried to shut them down"""". Headlines like this breed fear and bigotry.
Great press conference. Sean Spicer runs circles around 0bamas lackey Josh Ernest. Cant wait for his next one. ðŸ‘

Hahaha! Senator Cotton, do you really think Vice President Biden is going to waste his time 'debating' you, especially after what you've done? You should no longer be in the Senate. These 47 Republican legislators who wrote a letter to Iran are ignorant (don't they know the laws of the Constitution?), disrespectful (of a democratically and legally elected President), arrogant (in overstepping the authority of the President), racist (ready to do anything to destroy Barack Obama - remember Mitch McConnell's stmt, when B.O. first won the elections, that his first priority, instead of looking after the American ppl, would be to ensure B.O. would not get reelected), and the laughing stock of the world (even Iran had to lecture them about knowing their own laws). And, to make matters worse, this comes right after a similar act (that of brazenly inviting Netanyahu). Imagine if the Democrats had written a similar letter to Gorbachev during the Reagan administration and imagine the fury of the Republicans if that had happened. Disregarding the laws and the constitution of this country smacks of treason. What is happening to our Congress? That is not what our Founding Fathers worked for. I want these 47 pompous racists kicked out of our Congress! They no longer have my respect. And their continuing misbehavior (and this is a mild term for their act) is a threat to the democracy of this nation. Before anyone claims I am politically biased, the Democrats have never done something like this, ever.
I think it should be a lot more than 20 days. It should be closer to the maternity leave.
It is sad that our race is hated by everybody.
And Obama does... Lmfao
